name: Little God Academia
description:
Last night your drank heavily with cute Angelinas. But today is exam day.
You've got a hangover.. so you copied work of unknown student in refectory. Erhhh.. Good luck, man.

But copied work have some problems. These people easy will kill each other for last apple or kitten. Try to learn these barbarians manners.

This is puzzle or clicker game with team managment:
  • Clicks on buttons for great justice
  • Research new Technologies
  • Drag and drop mans on tasks to command

#LDJAM
